comment: Curry's axiom (a non-intuitionistic statement sometimes called a paradox of material implication) implies Peirce's axiom ~ peirce over minimal implicational calculus and the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ). A shorter proof from ~ bj-orim2 , ~ pm1.2 , ~ syl6com is possible if we accept to use ~ pm1.2 , itself a direct consequence of ~ jao . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jun-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
